items.name: hero-01
items.title: Hero 01 - Agency Hero Section
items.description: Clean agency hero section designed for SaaS and startup websites, featuring bold headline, gradient background, trust badges, client logos, and high converting CTAs for lead generation.

items.name: hero-02
items.title: Hero 02 - Real Estate Hero Section
items.description: Luxury real estate hero section crafted for property listings, featuring immersive imagery, location highlight, key amenities, pricing details, and prominent Schedule a tour CTA for faster inquiries.

items.name: hero-03
items.title: Hero 03 - Digital Agency Hero Section
items.description: High-impact digital agency hero section with cinematic background video, bold typography, brand driven headline, and clear CTA, perfect for creative studios and performance-focused marketing websites.

items.name: feature-01
items.title: Feature 01 - Feature with Testimonials
items.description: A trust focused feature section combining a highlighted customer testimonial with supporting benefit cards, perfect for product or SaaS pages to showcase social proof and reinforce key advantages.

items.name: feature-02
items.title: Feature 02 - Three Columns Feature with Icons
items.description: A clean three card feature grid with icons and concise copy, built for product or SaaS pages to communicate core benefits clearly while maintaining a developer friendly, scalable layout.

items.name: about-us-section-01
items.title: About Us 01 - Impact Metrics
items.description: A bold about us section combining value pillars, headline messaging, and performance counters, perfect for agencies or studios to highlight expertise, achievements, and credibility at a glance.

items.name: pricing-01
items.title: Pricing 01 - Startup Pricing Plans
items.description: A clean two tier pricing section with feature comparison, highlighted plans, and strong CTAs, suited for agencies, Startups & SaaS to convert visitors by clearly presenting value and monthly subscription options.

items.name: pricing-02
items.title: Pricing 02 - Scalable Pricing Table
items.description: A three tier pricing layout with a highlighted recommended plan, feature checklists, and clear CTAs, perfect for any website having pricing section to guide users toward the most valuable subscription option.

items.name: testimonial-01
items.title: Testimonial 01 - Bentro Grid Testimonials
items.description: A multi card testimonial section combining customer quotes, imagery, and performance stats, ideal for showcasing social proof, building trust, and reinforcing brand credibility across product or agency websites.

items.name: testimonial-02
items.title: Testimonial 02 - Testimonial Slider Showcase
items.description: A clean testimonial slider with customer photo, detailed quote, navigation controls, and partner logos—perfect for highlighting success stories and building instant trust on landing pages.

items.name: portfolio-01
items.title: Portfolio 01 - Clean Portfolio Grid
items.description: A modern portfolio section displaying featured projects with tags, visuals, and categories, ideal for agencies or freelancers to showcase real-world transformations, expertise, and design impact.

items.name: team-01
items.title: Team 01 - Creative Team Showcase
items.description: A vibrant team section featuring profile cards with roles and social links, perfect for agencies or startups to humanize their brand, highlight talent, and build authentic connections.

items.name: team-02
items.title: Team 02 - Modern Team Grid
items.description: A clean team grid with large profile cards, roles, and social icons, ideal for agencies or SaaS companies to introduce key members and strengthen brand authenticity.

items.name: cta-01
items.title: CTA 01 - Gradient Call-to-Action Banner
items.description: A minimal full width CTA section with soft gradient background, persuasive headline, and primary action button, perfect for converting visitors into leads at the end of any page.

items.name: cta-02
items.title: CTA 02 - Video Background CTA
items.description: A high impact call-to-action section with autoplay background video, bold overlay headline, primary button, and rotating ticker text, perfect for luxury brands or real estate to capture attention instantly.

items.name: services-01
items.title: Services 01 - Creative Services Overview
items.description: A colorful services section with icon cards and dual CTAs, perfect for agencies to present core offerings, guide visitors to portfolios, and drive collaboration with clear next steps.

items.name: services-02
items.title: Services 02 - Services Animated Block
items.description: A premium dark mode services section with interactive list, visual preview, and detailed descriptions, ideal for creative agencies to showcase capabilities while maintaining a bold, modern brand presence.

items.name: faq-01
items.title: FAQ 01 - Expandable FAQ Section
items.description: A clean accordion style FAQ section with expandable answers, ideal for agencies or SaaS sites to address common questions, reduce friction, and improve user confidence before conversion.

items.name: newsletter-01
items.title: Newsletter 01 - Newsletter Subscription CTA
items.description: A minimal newsletter signup section with bold headline, social-proof subtext, and inline email form, ideal for capturing leads and growing your audience with a frictionless experience.

items.name: blog-01
items.title: Blog 01 - Latest Blog & News Grid
items.description: A modern blog section with featured posts, large thumbnails, publish dates, and headlines, ideal for sharing agency updates, design insights, and thought leadership to keep visitors engaged.

items.name: contact-01
items.title: Contact 01 - Project Inquiry Contact Form
items.description: A conversion focused contact section with project inquiry form, contact details, and trust badges, ideal for agencies or freelancers to capture qualified leads and start meaningful client conversations.

items.name: navbar-01
items.title: Navbar 01 - Minimal Agency Navbar
items.description: A clean top navigation bar with logo, page links, and standout CTA button, ideal for agency or SaaS websites to guide users and drive collaboration effortlessly.

items.name: footer-01
items.title: Footer 01 - Agency Footer Layout
items.description: A clean multi column footer with brand summary, sitemap links, legal pages, contact details, and social icons, perfect for agencies to provide clarity, trust, and easy navigation.

items.name: footer-02
items.title: Footer 02 - Dark Conversion Footer
items.description: A bold dark themed footer with newsletter signup, strong contact CTA, navigation links, and legal pages, ideal for real estate or SaaS websites to drive engagement at the page end.

items.name: sidebar-01
items.title: Sidebar 01 - Admin Dashboard Sidebar
items.description: A collapsible sidebar navigation with grouped menus, icons, and upgrade CTA, perfect for admin dashboards to organize pages, widgets, and apps while keeping workflows fast and intuitive.

items.name: statistics-01
items.title: Statistics 01 - KPI Summary Cards
items.description: A compact statistics section with KPI cards highlighting earnings, expenses, weekly sales, and orders, ideal for admin dashboards to surface key business metrics at a glance.

items.name: statistics-02
items.title: Statistics 02 - Business Metrics Bar
items.description: A horizontal KPI bar displaying orders, sales, profit, and expenses with weekly change indicators, ideal for dashboards to monitor short-term performance and trends at a glance.

items.name: chart-01
items.title: Chart 01 - Sales Performance Bar Chart
items.description: An interactive stacked bar chart displaying monthly earnings, profit, and expenses, ideal for admin dashboards to visualize financial trends, track growth, and support data-driven business decisions.

items.name: chart-02
items.title: Chart 02 - Earnings Pie Chart
items.description: A clean donut chart widget summarizing total earnings with source-wise breakdown, perfect for admin dashboards to compare revenue streams, monitor growth, and highlight performance insights.

items.name: chart-03
items.title: Chart 03 - Yearly Sales Comparison
items.description: A smooth line chart comparing this year versus last year sales with summary stats, ideal for dashboards to visualize performance trends and identify seasonal growth patterns quickly.

items.name: charts-04
items.title: Chart 04 - Weekly Sales
items.description: A compact bar chart widget showing daily sales for the past week with trend indicator, perfect for dashboards to highlight short-term performance and spot high-activity days instantly.

items.name: bentogrid-01
items.title: Bento Grid 01 - Bento Grid Section
items.description: A visually rich bento grid that brings the world closer—highlighting stunning locations, cultural moments, and unforgettable experiences in a dynamic, bite-sized layout.

items.name: dashboard-shell-01
items.title: Dashboard Shell 01
items.description: A modern dashboard shell with a sidebar and header, ideal for admin dashboards to organize and navigate through different sections.

items.name: dialog-01
items.title: Dialog 01 - Newsletter Subscription Dialog
items.description: A modern modal popup for capturing newsletter signups with a friendly hero image, email field, opt-out checkbox, and clear call-to-action to boost conversions.

items.name: dropdown-01
items.title: Dropdown 01 - User Account Dropdown
items.description: A compact user profile dropdown with quick access to subscriptions, invoices, account settings, and secure sign out, designed to improve navigation within modern SaaS dashboards.

items.name: dropdown-02
items.title: Dropdown 02 - Notifications Dropdown
items.description: A real-time notifications dropdown displaying upcoming events, meetings, and reminders with timestamps and unread count—keeping users informed without leaving their workflow.

items.name: forgot-password-01
items.title: Forgot Password 01 - Forgot Your Password Page
items.description: A minimal password recovery page that lets users request a secure reset link via email, helping reduce friction and support issues in authentication flows.

items.name: forms-01
items.title: Forms 01 - Edit Profile Form
items.description: A user-friendly profile editing form with avatar upload, personal details, privacy controls, and action toggles, perfect for managing account information inside modern SaaS dashboards.

items.name: gallery-01
items.title: Gallery 01 - Image Gallery Section
items.description: Explore a curated collection of breathtaking destinations and unforgettable experiences from around the world.

items.name: login-01
items.title: Login 01 - Developer-Friendly Login Page
items.description: A clean, secure login page with Google and GitHub authentication, remember-me support, and password recovery, built for modern SaaS products using shadcn UI.

items.name: logo-cloud-01
items.title: Logo Cloud 01
items.description: A simple logo cloud built with Shadcn styling, using a subtle background, underlined heading, and a flexible grid of brand images that adapts smoothly across screen sizes.

items.name: register-01
items.title: Register 01 - Simple & Secure Signup Page
items.description: A streamlined signup page with Google and GitHub authentication, clean form fields, and conversion-focused layout, perfect for SaaS onboarding built with shadcn UI.

items.name: table-01
items.title: Table 01 - Project Management Table
items.description: A sortable projects table with manager, team avatars, progress indicators, search, and pagination, ideal for admin dashboards to track project status and streamline team workflows efficiently.

items.name: two-factor-authentication-01
items.title: Two Factor Authentication 01 - Two-Factor Authentication Page
items.description: A secure two-factor authentication screen with one-time code inputs and resend option, adding an extra protection layer to your SaaS login and user accounts.

items.name: verify-email-01
items.title: Verify Email 01 - Email Verification Page
items.description: A clean email verification screen that confirms account activation, guides users to check their inbox, and offers resend functionality for a smooth onboarding experience.

items.name: widget-01
items.title: Widget 01 - Analytics Overview Widget
items.description: A compact analytics widget displaying earnings and expenses with growth indicators, perfect for admin dashboards to provide quick financial insights without overwhelming the interface.

items.name: widget-02
items.title: Widget 02 - Sales by Country Widget
items.description: A ranked country wise sales widget with flags, revenue values, and growth indicators, ideal for dashboards to monitor geographic performance and spot emerging market trends quickly.
